RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 7 1/2F Turf CR: 70. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ABSOLUTELY stalked the pace inside for five furlongs in traffic midway on the final bend, split foes into the lane, took over, clear a furlong out, maintained daylight to the wire under steady handling. ROSIE'S ANGUS in mid pack, also encountered some traffic in the second turn, angled out three wide for room into the lane, chased the winner past the furlong marker, could do little with that one, clearly second best. SARATOGA PASODOBLE five wide into the first turn when off the pace, four wide onto the backstretch, was three wide and behind the winner out of the final bend, proved no match for the top two in the run to the wire. VIEWING TRAIL pressed the pace off the inside, had little left for the stretch run. RIPTIDE ROSE four wide into the first turn, remained in mid pack off the inside, fanned six wide into the stretch, improved slightly while not a serious threat. DIXIE FARMER broke through gate prestart, balked at reloading, lacked early foot, improved inside of several rivals then lacked a further advance to finish up flat the final furlong. ANGEL AND ME last away, continued to lack speed, two path into the lane, traffic nearing the furlong marker, angled in to improve a bit. R T'S GEM popped stall doors prior to the start, raced forward early, fell back a fit after half, five wide into the lane, had little left. VANCOUVER SNOW remained back in failing to threaten. WHO DAT GINGER bobbled slightly but broke alertly, set the pace for six furlongs then stopped down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Absolutely
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, traffic 2nd turn, split foes, shook clear

ENTRY.NAME: Rosie's Angus
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, traffic 2nd turn, angled 3w into lane, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Who Dat Ginger
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble, brk on top, pace, stopped drive

ENTRY.NAME: Viewing Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, little left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: R T's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: popped stall, doors forward early, 5w into lane, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Farmer
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate,balked, behind horses into lane, flat final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Riptide Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w into first turn, fanned 6w into lane, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Pasodoble
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4w 1st turn, 3w exiting final turn, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Vancouver Snow
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Angel and Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, traffic 1/8, angled in

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHEATIN CHARLIE dueled early along the inside, continued to hold a slight advantage early turn along the rail, disposed of the other speed by late in the bend, pulled away through the lane under steady handling. JAMAICAN ME fell back to trail after the start, began to move far turn, rallied four wide into the stretch and finished willingly to earn the place, not a threat to the winner. MIZSPELT in the second flight well out in the strip, four wide into the turn, proved no match for the winner the final furlong, caught for the place. QUARTER RAT last away, raced well back for five furlongs, improved with some belated interest out in the strip. SARAH'S VISION raced back off the pace, lacked a serious response in the drive. JANET'S DEVIL dueled up front outside the winner for over a half and caved. SMART ANALYSIS popped stall doors,forwardly placed three wide, faded through the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Cheatin Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early inside, shook clear into the lane, drew out

ENTRY.NAME: Quarter Rat
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back, belated interest off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah's Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked a serious response

ENTRY.NAME: Janet's Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled outside winner, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Analysis
ENTRY.COMMENT: popped stall doors, forward 3w, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mizspelt
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Hanna James E
ENTRY.COMMENT: second fight, 4w into lane, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 4w rally into the lane, willingly for 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVER RAFT in the second flight three wide, asked into the stretch, challenged outside the two leaders past the furlong marker, gained command, drifted out past the sixteenth marker, enough left to hold off the runner up. NO YIELD bothered to be last away, void of speed, continued back far turn, came three wide for the drive, late run with good energy to just miss. FIRST CLASS HARLOW vied up front closest to the inside, alternated the middle half, shook clear briefly late in the final turn, could not contain the top two. CHENTI broke out, raced back off the pace, saved ground second turn, improved along the rail into the stretch, continued with mild interest to the end. BOLT FROM ABOVE broke back, raced in mid pack along the inside, evenly late in lacking a closing punch. STEP ON IT vied up between horses, weakened drive. MOTANAAFER fell back after the start and was not involved. NEPHI set or forced the pace three wide, began to give way second turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Bolt From Above
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, mid pack, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: First Class Harlow
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front inside, shook clear, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Step On It
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up between foes, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Motanaafer
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, not involved

ENTRY.NAME: Nephi
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced the pace 3w, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Chenti
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, back off the pace, improved inside

ENTRY.NAME: No Yield
ENTRY.COMMENT: bother, last away, void of speed, rallied, getting to winner

ENTRY.NAME: River Raft
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 3w, asked into lane, outside bid, drifted, held late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 10, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since April 10, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claimin g Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOYFRIEND MATERIAL within striking distance in some traffic up the backstretch, outside turn, steered out into the five path and widest into the lane, set down, challenged past the furlong marker while drifting in to bother B W P Special, kicked well clear of that one while finishing up along the rail. B W P SPECIAL forwardly placed out in the strip, pressed the issue three wide through the turn, challenged when straightened for home, between horses a furlong out, bothered when the winner drifted in soon after, proved no match for that one, held sway for the runner up position. DRAFT CHOICE away well, showed the way up the backstretch, vied along the inside turn, weakened the final furlong,saved the show. FOOLISH STEVE back off the pace inside, shuffled back into the turn, moved off the inside, roused three wide into the stretch, improved position, not a serious threat to the top three. BIG BELLA BROWN closest to the early leader, contest the issue between foes through the turn, weakened the final furlong. LODE OF BLARNEY back off the early leader in some traffic in the two path, lacked the needed response in the drive. LIKEN IT back off the pace while in some traffic up the backstretch, failed to menace. FOLLOWING A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF B W P SPECIAL AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back rail 7/16, moved out, roused 3w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Lode of Blarney
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, lacked needed bid

ENTRY.NAME: Liken It
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well,showed way early, inside turn, weakened,saved 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Boyfriend Material
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance,5w into lane,outside bid, drifted in,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bella Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early 1p, vied btwn foes turn, faltered final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, pressed 3w turn, bid btwn, bother 1/16,2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 10, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 10, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNOCKALITTLELOUDER broke well, pressed the issue from along the inside in the run up the backstretch, shook clear midway on the turn, continued to hold a daylight advantage past the furlong pole, enough left to hold the runner up safe late. MISTS OF TIME in the second flight early,moved closest to the winner turning for home, chased that one past the furlong marker, not enough late to be in time. CRUSADER EXPRESS away in good order, in the second flight toward the inside, had little for the top two through the lane to finish up best of the rest. BUNKIE'S SONG off the pace and the inside up the backstretch, dropped inside turn, saved ground into the lane and went evenly to the wire. QUANA DUDE in mid pack while racing outside, came four wide for the drive, went one paced down the lane in lacking a closing kick. LT. BONURA in the main body out in the strip, also was four wide through the turn, lacked a closing response as well. TAPPED OUT popped stall doors, lacked speed in racing back, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. MOVE IT lacked speed, failed to muster a rally. BROAD DECISION off step slow, fell far back, was never a factor. MY BOY GUS broke sharp, set the early pace off the inside, stopped when headed in the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Mists of Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, closer turning for home, could not get winner

ENTRY.NAME: Bunkie's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Crusader Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3nd flight inside, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Move It
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Bonura
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body outside, 4w turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Tapped Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: popped stall doors, lacked speed, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Quana Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, four wide into the lane, one paced stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Broad Decision
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, fell far back, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Knockalittlelouder
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pressed inside, shook clear, held late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Earl Hernandez, Keith Hernandez & John Duvieilh

ENTRY.NAME: My Boy Gus
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, early pace, stopped late turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNT ON RAIN within striking distance while under some encouragement early, encountered some traffic through the turn, moved out a bit, bid inside the furlong marker, wore than rival down to prevail. HALF CRAZY took control just after the start, set the pace along the inside, held the winner at bay when that one moved closer upper stretch, proved stubborn before relenting in the final strides. RISKY PRIORITY reluctant to load, off a step slow then came in to steady falling far back, continued to trail by a wide margin turn, came four wide for the drive, late run well wide to finish up willingly and be up for the show. UNCLE CHAN in mid pack while racing outside, came five wide of the turn, moved closest to the top two with a furlong to run, lacked a closing punch to be nipped for the show spot. GOLDEN CONFUSION back off the pace, moved a bit closer four wide by late in the turn, failed to sustain that modest advance through the stretch. BLUE LEG JOHN prompted the pace while racing three wide, weakened. WAR KING broke alertly, pressed the issue for a half and stopped in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Count On Rain
ENTRY.OWNER: Benoit James Bourque Peggy and Bourque Sr Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, traffic turn, wore down leader late

ENTRY.NAME: Risky Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: off in, slowly, steadied, well back, asked 4w into lane,belated

ENTRY.NAME: Half Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: took control just after the start, pace, stubborn til late

ENTRY.NAME: War King
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, pressed, stopped stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Confusion
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer 4w turn, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Chan
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, 5w out of turn, lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Leg John
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3w, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 10, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 10, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BOSS MAN broke alertly, four wide into the first turn, prompted the two leaders three wide onto the backstretch, continued to the closest pursuer to that pair into the far turn, made a nice move on the outside to take command soon after, pulled away steadily through the lane while being kept to task. APPLEWOOD void of speed, saved ground far turn, raced in traffic midway on that bend,slipped through along the rail with a quarter to run under clever handling. MY BOOK settled off the pace while racing outside, moved closer to the outside of the winner far turn, chased that one into the lane, weakened a bit and was caught for the second spot. FOOLISH DREAMS away in good order, fell back to mid pack, came four wide into the lane, went evenly to the wire. MATH MAN broke toward the front, settled back off the pace, came five wide for the drive, improved position slightly with some mild late down the middle part of the strip. ADIEU LE CHAT bumped start, in mid pack while racing three wide, lacked a response. J C'S IN TOWN dueled up front along the inside, continued to alternate up the backstretch, began to falter midway on the final turn, continued to tire. BASSETT trailed most of the way, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. BODE'S LIGHT remained back and never threatened. CAEUS IN PASADENA moved up to duel into the first turn, continued to duel backstretch in the two path, stopped into the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: J C's in Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, began to falter far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Math Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke toward front, settled, 5w into lane, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, fell back mid pack, 4w into lane, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Caeus in Pasadena
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to duel 2p, stopped far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back and never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Applewood
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, inside, traffic 2nd, angled out, willing 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Big Boss Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, prompted leaders 3w, nice move 2nd, drew away

ENTRY.NAME: Bassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bump, trailed, passed couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Adieu Le Chat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, mid pack three wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: My Book
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace outside, closer 2nd, chased, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 10, 2023 Allo wed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HALF PAGE broke out to help tighten up GALAXY THIRTYSIX, was straightened to be forwardly placed early inside, fell back into the turn, moved out four wide, rebid past the furlong marker, dueled to the wire, proved best in a determined effort. SIENNA BREEZE in the second group early outside, crept up closer three wide turn, put a head in front approaching the furlong grounds, dueled to the line inside the winner, outkicked by that one, held the place. CATCAKE broke in, to help tighten up GALAXY THIRTYSIX, raced well back early, four wide wide exiting the turn, rallied through upper stretch, getting to runner up late. GALAXY THIRTYSIX squeezed back at the break, trailed for a half, angled out to be five wide exiting the turn, displayed some mild interest down the middle of the strip to better her position. SOPHIE'S PRAYER pressured the leader for a half in the two path and faltered. TUGBOAT off a step slow, saved ground to no avail,. BRAVE CITY GIRL broke on top, showed the way for almost a half inside, gave way at the head of the lane. HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Half Page
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward inside, fell back, moved out 4w, rebid, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Galaxy Thirtysix
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed back start, trailed swung 5w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Catcake
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, raced back, 4w into lane, getting to runner up

ENTRY.NAME: Brave City Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace, larger lead, gave way stretch inside

ENTRY.NAME: Sophie's Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Tugboat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, saved ground to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Sienna Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: second group outside, 3w turn, bid, dueled, outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: A P HUMOR void of early foot, began to advance in the turn, fanned five wide into the lane, closed with good resolve down the middle of the strip to be in time. TALENTS HOT DEAL broke on top despite bobbling, soon clear, continued to show the way by daylight through the turn and into the lane, still held a daylight advantage a furlong out, run down by the winner. STOP SHOP N DROP back off the pace and the inside, in some traffic into the lane, staged a rally from between horses to annex the show. ROSIE SPRIT in mid pack and inside, continued to save ground turn, improved a bit through the lane while continuing along the rail. SABERFIGHT forwardly placed off the inside, continued within striking distance turning for home, came up empty for the drive. DARING DARIAN broke back, trailed early, two path into the lane,improved position without posing a serious threat. DIATONIC within striking distance up the backstretch, four wide turn, tired through the stretch. KATIE'S C pressed the runner up for over a half off the inside, gave way. MISS E. FU off a step slow, moved up to mid pack, gave way in the drive. BLUE RIDGE ROMANCE was finished early, well beaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Daring Darian
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, trailed, improved off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Ridge Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, well beaten

ENTRY.NAME: Stop Shop N Drop
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, rallied btwn foes for show

ENTRY.NAME: Rosie Sprit
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and inside, continued to save ground, improved bit

ENTRY.NAME: Miss E. Fu
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, mid pack, backed up drive

ENTRY.NAME: Talents Hot Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble, brk sharp, cleared, all the pace, run down

ENTRY.NAME: A P Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, fanned 5w into lane, in time midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: Saberfight
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, three wide, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's C
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Diatonic
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w turn, tired
